metadata.title: CVE-2017-5504 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description: The jpc_undo_roi function in libjasper/jpc/jpc_dec.c in JasPer 1.900.27allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (invalid memory readand crash) via a crafted image.

criterions.comment: jasper: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
